sentences.english: In the first few years after I moved there, lotus flowers continued to blossom on the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 刚搬来的几年，池塘里还有荷花。

sentences.english: Outside the pavilion, a pond and Japanese gardens add to the beauty.
sentences.chinese: 在阁寺外，一座池塘和美丽的日式花园更添其美景。

sentences.english: Miniature wooden house on pond, traditional house in background, Aland Islands.
sentences.chinese: 奥兰群岛，池塘中的模型木屋以及背后的传统房屋。

sentences.english: Once, a group of frogs lived in a little pond.
sentences.chinese: 从前，有一群青蛙居住在一个小池塘。

sentences.english: Her house is built near beautiful pool.
sentences.chinese: 她的房子建中一个美丽的池塘边。

sentences.english: My brother and I took a small washbasin came to the pond.
sentences.chinese: 我和弟弟拿着一个小脸盆来到池塘边。
蚊子滋生于不流动的池塘里。

sentences.english: The sectarian thinks that he has the sea ladled into his private pond.
sentences.chinese: 自私偏狭者以为他能将沧海之水全部舀进自己的池塘。

sentences.english: We also raise fish in those ponds over there.
sentences.chinese: 我们同样在那里的池塘里饲养鱼。

sentences.english: The corn fields and meadows were surrounded by large forests, in the midst of which were deep pools.
sentences.chinese: 稻田和草地被大森林包围，森林中央有深的池塘水淀。

sentences.english: Once, I went swimming in a pond with a hippo.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我还与一头河马同游池塘。

sentences.english: The wind was whipping waves of sleet across the pond.
sentences.chinese: 寒风卷着雨夹雪，在池塘上肆虐。

sentences.english: Is there any more diving into the deep rock-pool below the Bee-Rocks, Little Brother?
sentences.chinese: 你还能在蜜蜂岩下的石头池塘里潜水吗，小兄弟？

sentences.english: The gander circled the pond for days, and more days after that.
sentences.chinese: 那雄鹅成天围着池塘转，日复一日。

sentences.english: There is a flock of waterfowls on the pond.
Grandpa is a happy guy, who goes to fish in the pond every day.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷见天都要去池塘钓鱼，真是个快乐的老人。

definition: Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
water plants/habitat with water source and grass
Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
